files.name: AME Wizard
files.description: The Ultimate tool for modifying Windows. This is used for essentially running registry tweaks and powershell scripts in the form of playbooks (ReviOS). Much safer than using unknown distributed ISO mods.

files.name: ReviOS Playbook
files.description: ReviOS is a customized version of Windows, designed to be lightweight, stable, and focused on improving performance, privacy and compatibility. This is the primary layer for optimization tweaks and is the best combination of performance without breaking core Windows functionality.

files.name: optimizer
files.description: Optimizer is used to apply specific system tweaks on fresh installs. This is layer one of any optimization tweaks.

files.name: WinMemoryCleaner
files.description: Utility that uses native Windows features to optimize memory areas.

files.name: Windows On Reins [EXPERT/OPTIONAL]
files.description: Only use this if you know what you are doing (explained in the Guide and not used in the screenshots). This is for pure performance and the Powershell script to dramatically harden, debloat, optimize, enhance privacy, avoid fingerprinting and improve performance on Windows 10 and 11 but it breaks many things.

files.name: SecureUxTheme
files.description: A secure boot compatible in-memory UxTheme patcher // used for applying modded msstyles themes

files.name: 7TSP
files.description: Patches .mun files allowing for custom icons/icon packs

files.name: ExplorerBlurMica
files.description: Add background blur effect, Acrylic or Mica effect to Explorer

files.name: ExplorerBgTool
files.description: Tool that allows users to have a custom background image for Windows 11  within Explorer

files.name: DWMBlurGlass
files.description: Add custom effects to the global system title bar and other core Windows applications

files.name: Windhawk
files.description: The customization marketplace for Windows programs - used for various Windows 11 taskbar mods and animation cleanup

files.name: ExplorerPatcher
files.description: Modifies the start menu // better version is StartIsBack though this is just a free alternative!

files.name: mactype
files.description: Better font rendering for Windows // set to service mode

files.name: Chawye Hsu's MacType Profile
files.description: Better font rendering for Windows // set to service mode

files.name: TranslucentTB
files.description: A lightweight utility that makes the Windows taskbar translucent/transparent

files.name: Rainmeter
files.description: Rainmeter allows you to display customizable skins on your desktop

files.name: MicaForEveryone
files.description: Rainmeter allows you to display customizable skins on your desktop

files.name: Chris Titus Tech's Windows Utility
files.description: Install Programs, Tweaks, Fixes, and Updates // Layer 02 for configuring Windows quickly. Use the config file provided in /config
